fields.name: NEBNext Ultra II DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina
fields.explanation: enzymes and buffers ideal to convert a small amount of DNA input into indexed libraries

fields.name: TruSeq DNA PCR-Free Sample Preparation
fields.explanation: covaris-assisted shearing of DNA to desired fragment size, ligation of indexed adaptors, no PCR
fields.input_requirements: 1 µg high molecular weight genomic DANN

fields.name: Nextera DNA Sample Preparation
fields.explanation: fragmentation and adaptor ligation in a single step (tagmentation), PCR to provide single- or dual-indexed libraries
fields.input_requirements: 50 ng high molecular weight genomic DNA
fields.comments: can be used for: large/complex Genome sequencing

fields.name: Nextera XT DNA Sample Preparation
fields.explanation: fragmentation and adaptor ligation in a single step (tagmentation), PCR to provide single- or dual-indexed libraries
fields.comments: can be used for: small Genome, Amplicons, Plasmide, ds-cDNA sequencing

fields.name: TruSeq DNA Methylation Kit
fields.explanation: bisulfite conversion of input DNA, prep of indexed libraries
fields.input_requirements: 50-100 ng high molecular weight genomic DNA

fields.name: Custom protocol for amplicon preparation
fields.explanation: Amplicons provided by user, PCR is done by facility to produce indexed sequencing libraries

fields.name: TruSeq Stranded mRNA
fields.explanation: mRNA enrichment with poly-T oligo attached magnetic beads, cDNA prep (random priming, dUTP incorporation for strand specificity), indexed library preparation
fields.comments: previously isolated mRNA can also serve as starting material

fields.name: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA (Gold)
fields.explanation: removal of rRNA using biotinylated, target-specific oligos combined with magnetic Ribo-Zero rRNA removal beads. Gold: depletion of both cytoplasmic and mitochondrial rRNA, cDNA prep (random priming, dUTP incorporation for strand specificity), indexed
fields.comments: Oligos designed to target Mouse/Rat/Human, can be used for other organisms drosophila/zebrafish

fields.name: SMART-Seq v4 Ultra Low Input RNA
fields.explanation: double-stranded full length cDNA preparation (dT-priming), Conversion of cDNA into indexed libraries using i.e. Nextera DNA library preparation

fields.name: TruSeq Small RNA Sample Prep
fields.explanation: ligation of adapters to small RNA molecules, first strand cDNA synthesis, PCR enrichment for indexed library preparation, purification with polyacryamid gelelectrophoresis

fields.name: NEBNext Ultra RNA Library Prep (mRNA)
fields.explanation: mRNA enrichment with poly-T oligo attached magnetic beads, cDNA prep (random priming), indexed library prep
fields.comments: alternative to TruSeq stranded mRNA, lower RNA input, no strand specificity

fields.name: NEBNext Ultra RNA Library Prep (total RNA)
fields.explanation: removal of rRNA using target-specific oligos combined with RNaseH and DNaseI digestion, cDNA prep (random priming), indexed library prep
fields.comments: alternative to TruSeq stranded total RNA kit, alternate rRNA removal technology, no strand specificity

fields.name: Cel-Seq 2 for single cell RNA-Seq
fields.explanation: NA

fields.name: Quality Control
fields.comments: Not a protocol. It's a special entry used for the Preparation Costs calculation for libraries.

fields.name: ChIP (std sonication) plus NEB II
fields.explanation: Standardized chromatin extraction (NEXSON + shearing), immunoprecipitation, DNA purification, library (NEB Next Ultra II)
fields.typical_application: ChIP-seq for histones and abundant TF
fields.comments: procedure developed for gold standard epigenome production within the International Human Epigenome Consortium (IHEC). For additional details follow this publication: doi: 10.1093/nar/gkv1495

fields.name: Lexogen 3'mRNA-Seq
fields.explanation: 3' Prime Seq

fields.name: 10xGenomics for single cell RNA-Seq
fields.explanation: NA

fields.name: ChIP RELACS high-throughput
fields.explanation: multiplexed ChIP for histones and TFs

fields.name: ChIP RELACS using Std library
fields.explanation: The protocol uses the RELACS workflow but without the nuclei barcoding step. Library is prepared on purified DNA using the NEB workflow
fields.typical_application: enzymatic ChIP for small scale studies. Best suited for weakly bound TFs

fields.name: NEBNext Low Input RNA Library Preparation
fields.explanation: prepration and amplification of full length cDNA, cDNA library preparation

fields.name: ChIP Std protocol
fields.explanation: Nuclei extraction (NEXSON), chromatin shearing and immunoprecipitation
fields.typical_application: ChIP-seq for histones and abundant TF

fields.name: HI-C
fields.explanation: Optimized in situ Hi-C protocol for mammals or Drosophila
fields.comments: Contact the facility for project discussion

fields.name: NEBNext Enzymatic Methyl-seq (EM-seq)
fields.explanation: Improved workflow for the detection of 5-mC and 5-hmC DNA modifications

fields.name: Nanopore Direct RNA (SQK-RNA002)
fields.explanation: Direct RNA Sequencing
fields.comments:
Kit is recommended for:
native RNA-Seq, exploration of modified bases

fields.name: QuantSeq 3’ mRNA-Seq Library Prep FWD
fields.explanation: QuantSeq FWD contains the Illumina Read 1 linker sequence in the second strand synthesis primer, hence NGS reads are generated towards the poly(A) tail, directly reflecting the mRNA sequence. Recommended  for Gene Expression Analysis.

fields.name: QuantSeq 3’ mRNA-Seq Library Prep REV
fields.explanation: With QuantSeq Reverse (REV) it is possible to exactly pinpoint the 3’ end in Read 1, hence to study the 3’ UTR and alternative polyadenylation. With the Custom Sequencing Primer the first nucleotide of Reads 1 is the last nucleotide of the mRNA

fields.name: Nanopore Custom Total RNA
fields.explanation: Sequencing of full-length transcripts after ribo-depletion
fields.input_requirements: 10 µg of very high quality RNA (RQN/RINe >9)
fields.typical_application: Full-length cDNA sequencing of ribo-depleted RNA
fields.comments: Custom protocol to sequence full-length transcripts of (ribo-depleted) total RNA. Note that very high quality and quantity of input RNA is required. This custom protocol adds a poly-A tail to all RNA fragments, i.e. RNAs with and without native poly-A tail will be polyadenylated resulting in longer poly-A tails for RNAs with native poly-A tail and an artificial poly-A tail for RNAs without native poly-A tail.

fields.name: Nanopore Custom ncRNA
fields.explanation: Sequencing of full-length ncRNA transcripts
fields.input_requirements: 10 µg of very high quality RNA (RQN/RINe >9)
fields.comments:
Custom protocol to sequence full-length transcripts of non-coding RNA. Note that very high quality and quantity of input RNA is required. Input RNA is first ribo- then mRNA depleted (using oligo-d(T)).
This custom protocol adds a poly-A tail to all RNA fragments; also those without native poly-A tail.

fields.name: NEBNext Multiplex Small RNALibrary Prep
fields.explanation: Small RNA library preparation from total RNA

fields.name: CUT_and_x
fields.explanation: NA

fields.name: Illumina Stranded Total RNA w/ Ribo-Zero Plus
fields.explanation: ribo-depleted RNAseq with strand information

fields.name: Illumina Stranded mRNA Prep, Ligation
fields.explanation: stranded mRNA library preparation
fields.comments: selection of mRNAs via poly-A capture, strand information

fields.name: Nanopore Ultra-Long DNA (SQK-ULK001)
fields.explanation: Preparation of ultra high molecular weight (uHMW) DNA for sequencing with Oxford Nanopore devices
fields.input_requirements: 6 M cells from culture, or 40µg of uHMW DNA in max. 750 ul buffer: 10 mM Tris.HCl, 1 mM EDTA pH 9,  0.02% v/v Triton X-100
fields.comments:
Either cells form culture or already extracted uHMW gDNA can be submitted.

For cells: Please alert us at least 5 working days before you plan on submitting the cells. Then bring 6 M cells with a minimum of 90% living cells. Prior FACS sorting is recommeded, please submit the sorting report along with the cells. First QC point is eluted gDNA. 

For gDNA: Please make sure to elute gDNA in EB containing 0.02% Triton X-100 (10 mM Tris.HCl, 1 mM EDTA pH 9,  0.02% v/v Triton X-100 ). Required are 40µg of uHMW gDNA in max. 750 ul. Initial QC is done before beginning the library preparation.

We will contact you if the majority of your extracted gDNA is below 50kb or you do not have the minimum of 40µg required input.

fields.name: ATAC-seq
fields.explanation: the protocol start with nuclei extraction and incubation of nuclei with Tn5, which will insert transposon in accessible chromatin regions. The regions will be then enriched by PCR.

fields.name: Nanopore DNAseq (SQK-LSK114)
fields.explanation: DNA sequencing with barcoding option
fields.comments: Recommended when high-throughput is required (typically 8+ Gb per flow cell). Recommended for DNA fragments of up to 50kb. PCR-free. Duplex reads with higher accuracies are available – please contact us if interested in these.

fields.name: Nanopore cDNA PCR (SQK-PCB111.24)
fields.explanation: Sequencing of full-length transcripts
fields.input_requirements: 4 ng PolyA RNA, 200 ng Total RNA
fields.comments: This kit is highly recommended for users who would like to identify and quantify full-length transcripts want to explore isoforms, splice variants and fusion transcripts using full-length cDNAs have a low starting amount of RNA would like to generate high amounts of cDNA data wish to start from total RNA wish to multiplex samples to reduce price per sample.

fields.name: Chromium Next GEM Single Cell ATAC v2
fields.explanation: single cell ATAC-seq based on Chromium Controller
fields.comments: Used to determine the regulatory landscape of chromatin in hundreds to thousands of cells in a single sample.

fields.name: Chromium_NextGEM_SingleCell3Prime_GeneExpression_v3.1_DualIndex
fields.explanation: NA

fields.name: Chromium_NextGEM_Multiome_ATAC
fields.explanation: scATAC seq part for combined scATAC and scRNA libraries.

fields.name: Chromium_NextGEM_Multiome_GEX
fields.explanation: scRNA seq part for combined scATAC and scRNA libraries.

fields.name: Nanopore Pore-C v2
fields.explanation: the protocol measures long range interactions with long reads sequencing. Similar to Hi-C but without biotin selection of ligated fragments and coupled with long read

fields.name: ATAC-seq for fixed cells v1
fields.explanation: open chromatin assay on formaldehyde fixed cells

fields.name: MuxATAC-seq for fixed cells v1
fields.explanation: open chromatin assay on formaldehyde fixed cells using barcoded Tn5

fields.name: MUXscATAC-seq v3
fields.explanation: open chromatin single cell ATAC-seq assay using 10x Genomics chromium technology and custom protocol for Tn5 sample barcoding

fields.name: HiChIP v1
fields.explanation: to discover long range interactions mediated by a specific factor
